nodes.text: The Canny Bargain was a starship that served in the New Republic's fleet. The vessel participated in the New Republic's assault on the Galactic Empire's loyalist forces in 5 ABY. During the subsequent battle, the Canny Bargain lost its shields and suffered a hull breach. The ship chose to withdraw, and news of the retreat reached the refitted New Republic Star Destroyer Deliverance, where General Hera Syndulla was informed of the Canny Bargain's withdrawal by a bridge officer.
The Canny Bargain was mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
